For now we can deal with this by ignoring the exception.
But according to the trace you seem to set breakpoint pending on.
Things should work but the CDT should do a better job at
bringing this info to the User, i.e. a breakpoint is set but
not yet enable(still pending).

We can deal with this in CDT-3.1

For now let me know if the head works for you
